Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Grand. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Grand.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute near 92nd/Burley
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses temp. rerouted EB: 92nd, Houston, 91st, Buffalo and 92nd; WB 92nd, Burley, 92st, Houston and 92nd: due to, street blockage near 92nd/Burley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 92nd/Burley due to street blockage near 92nd/Burley.

Eastbound buses will operate via 92bd, Houston, 91st, Buffalo and 92nd including the normal route streets.

Westbound buses will operate via 92nd, Burley, 91st, Houston and 92nd.

Allow extra travel time.
